document_data.name: Belmora
document_data.mainbody: '''Belmora''' was a [[dwarf]] [[priestess]] of [[the North]] and a member of the [[Company of the White Star]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. She died while defending her clan-hold against an invading [[orc]] warband.
